game.name: Meowzic Survivor
game.shortDescription: A rhythm-action roguelike where cute feline warriors harness the power of music to survive waves of enemies in a synthwave world. Control rhythms and manipulating BPM to master combat, defeat bosses, and rescue your human master—all brought to life in vibrant pixel art and neon lights.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A rhythm-action roguelike where cute feline warriors harness the power of music to survive waves of enemies in a synthwave world. Control rhythms and manipulating BPM to master combat, defeat bosses, and rescue your human master—all brought to life in vibrant pixel art and neon lights.
